Digital Saves The Economy

24 Jun 1999

At least, according to a report to be released Tuesday by the U.S. department of commerce. According to the study, the "digital world is driving the nation's economic growth, holding down its inflation rate and transforming the American workplace."

Amazing "inventor of the Internet" and presidential candidate, Al Gore, will unveil the study. Read the details on the USA Today site. \n
